Title: Strike
Cardtext: *Attack* target

Title: Block
Cardtext: Add Constitution + Brawl Block

Title: Deflect
Cardtext: Add Quickness + Weapons Block

Title: Dodge
Cardtext: Add one Dodge

Title: Saw it Coming
Cardtext: Target enemy. Add one Dodge

Title: Scout's Motto
Cardtext: Add Security + Intelligence Block. You don't lose block on your next upkeep.

Title: Counter-Strike
Cardtext: Quick. Attack target who is attacking you. If you hit and are not blocked, counter target attack.

Title: Oh no you don't!
Cardtext: Quick. Attack target who is attacking someone that isn't you. If you hit, you may change targets of target attack (Targets must be valid)

Title: The Mozambique
Cardtext: Attack target twice. If you hit and weren't blocked, attack that target once for double damage.

Title: First Aid
Cardtext: Remove any number of Ailments from adjacent target

Title: Knowledge(X)
Cardtext: Draw 1 card

Title: Knowledge Sprite
Cardtext: Knowledge cards you play cost (1) less

Title: Preparation
Cardtext: Draw Intelligence cards. Put 2 cards back into your deck.

Title: Attack of Opportunity
Cardtext: Quick. Attack target enemy that has moved this turn. Add 1 action point

Title: Forcebolt
Cardtext: Deal Forces damage to target enemy within 40m

Title: Magic missile.
Cardtext: Strive <1>. Deal Intelligence damage to any number of targets.

Title: Fireball
Cardtext: Deal Intelligence * 2 damage to everyone within Attunement * 2 meters.

Title: Heal
Cardtext: Heal target for Light Health

Title: Counter Spell
Cardtext: Quick. Counter target spell.

Title: I prepared explosive runes this morning.
Cardtext: Exile a spell from your hand. You may cast it from exile as though it has Quick until you move.

Title: Drain life
Cardtext: Deal Dark Damage to adjacent target without dodge. Gain that much life.

Title: Drain Energy
Cardtext: Deal Intution damage to adjacent target without dodge. Add that much mana

Title: Charge!
Cardtext: Move up to 10m in a straight line towards target enemy. You may make an attack against that enemy.

Title: Blink
Cardtext: Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within (Int + Wil) metres

Title: Mana Sprite
Cardtext: Gain 1 Maximum Mana

Title: Fire Sprite
Cardtext: Sacrifice Fire Sprite: Gain 3 mana

Title: Sidhe Knight
Cardtext: Sidhe Knight has 3 armor and gains 1 dodge at the end of its summoner's turn

Title: Bear
Cardtext: I regain all my health at the end of my controller's turn

Title: Parkour
Cardtext: You may move through half cover as if it were flat ground. Exhaust.

Title: Grenade
Cardtext: At the beginning of my controller's turn, sacrifice me. When I die, I deal 10 damage to everyone within 10m.

Title: Mage Armor
Cardtext: Gain 2 Armor. At the beginning of each of your turns, pay 1 mana. If you don't, lose this armor. Exhaust.

Title: Double-Team
Cardtext: Quick. Make 1 ranged attack against a target who has moved this turn. During your turn, You may pay 1 and exhaust this card. If you do, you may play it from exhaustion until you move.

Title: Overwatch
Cardtext: Quick. Make 1 ranged attack against a target who has moved this turn. You may pay 1 and exhaust this card. If you do, you may play it from exhaustion.

Title: Drive(X)
Cardtext: Add 2 Action Points

Title: Sneak Attack
Cardtext: Attack a target who you haven't attacked this turn. This attack ignores dodge.

Title: Flurry of blows.
Cardtext: Make (Quickness) melee attacks.

Title: Mage hand
Cardtext: Make a melee attack against a target within (Precision) meters.

Title: Mirror Image
Cardtext: Add (Charisma) Dodge

Title: Wild Fey
Cardtext: Add <1> whenever you draw a card. You maximum mana is 0.

Title: Overcharge
Cardtext: Add (Charisma) Mana to target within (Medicine) * 2 meters

Title: Ice Fairy
Cardtext: You may not end movement within 1 meter of me.

Title: Mana Conduit
Cardtext: Your summons gain +1/+1 for each mana over maximum you have.

Title: Thorns the cat
Cardtext: I occupy the same space as you. When you block damage, I do (Charisma) damage to the attacker.

Title: Spirit Link
Cardtext: When you take unblocked damage, I deal that much damage to the closest entity.

Title: Fog Bank
Cardtext: Allies ending their turn within 5 meters of me gain 1 dodge.

Title: Charge!
Cardtext: Make a melee attack with a damage bonus equal to the number of meters you moved this turn.

Title: Subtle Spell
Cardtext: Spells you cast cost (1) less to cast. Exhaust.

Title: Assassin's Step
Cardtext: Teleport adjacent to a target. You may make an attack against that target.

Title: Dimension Door
Cardtext: Teleport to target unoccupied space within (Spaces)*5 meters

Title: Vista Strike
Cardtext: Choose target. Until your next turn, you make make melee attacks as though you were next to that target.

Title: Vista's Shield
Cardtext: For each card/ability that targets you, counter it unless its controller pays (2)

Title: Deflecting Bend
Cardtext: Quick. Change a target from you to another valid target.

Title: Beserk Influence
Cardtext: I share your space. Gain +1 to Strength, Quickness and Constitution. You may not gain block or dodge.

Title: Spirit of Poison
Cardtext: Being within 5 meters of me gives you a poison counter. This ability only activates once per turn. I gain 1 Dodge at the end of your turn.

Title: Mascot Spirit
Cardtext: When you summon another spirit, return me to your hand from exhaustion

Title: Haste
Cardtext: You have +3 Quickness. Exhaust.

Title: Adrenaline Booster
Cardtext: Gain +1 Strength and Quickness. Exhaust.

Title: Dark Offering
Cardtext: Sacrifice a summon. Gain 1 Willpower.

Title: Wring out
Cardtext: Reveal the top card of your draw pile. If it's a spell, cast it without paying its costs; you lose 1 life for every point of mana in its cost.

Title: Foresight.
Cardtext: Scry 2. Gain (Intuition) Block.

Title: Banishment
Cardtext: Destroy target summon

Title: Deja Vu
Cardtext: You may cast spells as though they have quick. If you cast a non-quick spell this way, it costs <1> more and has Exhaust.

Title: Life for a Life
Cardtext: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a summon. Deal 30 damage to any target.

Title: Headshot
Cardtext: Make a ranged attack for double damage

Title: True Name.
Cardtext: Gain control of target summon

Title: Sidhe Archer
Cardtext: I gain 1 dodge at the end of your turn.

Title: Queen of Summer
Cardtext: Moving within 5 meters of me causes enemies to take 10 damage. This ability triggers once per turn per enemy. I gain 1 dodge at the end of your turn.

Title: Queen of Winter
Cardtext: Enemies ending their turn within 5 feet of me lose 5 life.

Title: Turn back time
Cardtext: Take another turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

Title: Earthen Influence
Cardtext: I occupy your space Whenever you gain block, I gain that much block. If you would take unblocked damage, redirect that damage to me
